extension.description: 0.2.6 - Resolver fix. 0.2.5 - Added extra error handling. Force http to hopefully prevent ssl error. Some code cleanup. v0.2.4 - Resolver fix. v0.2.3 - Updated to use new api. v0.2.2 - Changed favourites file path to prevent favourites deleting when addon updates. Added autoplay option in settings. Added new api for channels from Daddylive which includes more channels! v0.2.1 - Fix some resolvers. Added extra players. v0.2.0 - Added favourite channels. Add/remove a channel via context menu. Added toggle timeshift on/off in settings. Timeshift enables pause and rewind but requires available storage. New code framework.
